TASK: Craft an item of type: redstone
inventory=[{"type": "horn_coral_block", "quantity": 32, "index": 13}, {"type": "stone_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "end_portal_frame", "quantity": 25, "index": 16}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 40, "index": 17}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 11, "index": 22}, {"type": "redstone_ore", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "carrot_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 49, "index": 36}]
thought: The only way to craft redstone is to smelt the redstone ore at slot 23 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
act: smelt from slot 23 to slot 11 with quantity 1
